title: PROTECTING OUR CHILDREN FROM COVID-19 THROUGH VACCINATION

files.name: Supporting Your Child Through Their Vaccination.pdf

title: Protecting Our Children from COVID-19 through Vaccination
description: As shared earlier, from 6 January 2022, parents/guardians of all children aged 5 to 8, including those enrolled in ECDA licensed preschools, may proceed to register their interest on the MOH National Appointment System (NAS) at child.vaccine.gov.sg.  After registration, parents/guardians can expect to receive a unique link via SMS within 3 to 5 working days to book a vaccination appointment.  Children who turn 5 in 2022 must have crossed their 5th birthday before they are eligible to book an appointment and receive the vaccination.
